"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c8c7c6368720667780100#post_548c8c7c6368720667780100
It's the child rape stuff that bothered me.
It wasn't the game that thought it was a reward, _HE_ thought it was a reward.
A bunch of games give backstory as an unlockable. It was a demo so they had to find a way to give backstory.

He obviously thought he was being rewarded when he wasn't and he threw a massive hissy fit because of it.

topics.body:
You know; I had a thought: anyone ever think how much humans act like animals even though we claim not to?

Let's cut out all the "I am enlightened" crap people constantly spew to justify everything; how much do you personally act like a literal animal?  Keep in mind that a lot of animals do have social structures, some even have basic forms of morality, some have wars, some have discriminatory views of outsiders, they obviously have emotions and a lot of things; hell there's even been cases of animals dying to due to depression from having a animal they're close to or their owner's die or such.
